title: Scrim Club Invitation - Weekly scrim nights Monday and Tuesday (6 teams already registered)

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Whatsup Oceania,

This server is a hub for teams looking to scrim. It also has players looking for teams so if you're looking to fill some roles this is a good place to do it.

The server holds weekly scrim nights on Monday and Tuesday 7PM-10PM AEST. You're welcome to participate in just 1 night or if the timeslots don't suit you at all, you're not required to participate and can scrim teams from the server whenever you like.

**Server Size**
Players: 186
Registered Teams: 6

1st scrim night kicks on Monday 4th of June 7PM AEST. Great opportunity to get some high-pressure games in before Clash.

See you there!
